song.title: Blunderbuss
song.info:
2nd place in combined demo compo at Main 2009
Lyrics: I thought it would be easy but it was not I'm back at the start with a blunderbuss
Always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things to do
Always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things to do
I thought it would be easy but it was not It's proven, it's proven with my blunderbuss The feeble marks it leaves when it triggers You can have my blunderbuss As long as you will promise to polish it and laugh with it and then Kill a lot of men with it
I always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things to do
Always had a lot of things Always had a lot of things And it will grow and then loose all sense I have
